summary: Converts Moss Mother Cavern into a player home upon clearing the related quest.
descriptionHtml:
This adds a WIP player home inside Moss Mother Cavern.
Or rather, it changes the cavern into one upon clearing the related quest, given by the guy conveniently sitting right outside.
If you\'ve already cleared the quest, that\'s not a problem - it will still work.

You can find the cavern northwest of Half-Moon Mill, which is on the west bank of Lake North-Of-Falkreath.
I don\'t know what the real name is because the UI is terrible and the map has no labels. I\'m not even sure if the directions are correct because the UI is terrible and the map has no labels.

It\'s not finished yet, but is currently entirely playable.

It makes the following changes, most of which occur after you help the guy out and he heads home:
- Removes all the bear traps and enemy spawns
- Removes \"cleared\" label from the map marker
- Prevents the area from reseting
- Makes all the containers in the dungeon safe for storage
- Adds a half-finished hobo shack with a nightstand and bed inside and enchanting and alchemy tables on the roof
- Adds a crafting area with a forge, workbench, tanning rack, grindstone, and some extra storage
- Enables fast travel from the area
- Makes the area ineligible as a radiant quest location. I think. Maybe.

Note that it triggers when he goes home, not when he heads inside the cavern.
If you fast travel to Falkreath and back he should be finished up.
author: whalecakes

files.name: Moss Mother Cavern Home
files.changelogHtml:
Upgraded hobo shack
Moved enchanting/alchemy tables to hobo shack roof (they\'ll probably get moved again later)
Enabled fast travel
Fixed a few support beams on the hobo shack
Hobo shack bed now gives \'well rested\' instead of just \'rested\'
